description: A override line related to a single override against a sales order entity (SOH, SOL).  Multiple override lines are possible (1:*), thus this line object is typically in an array

LineIds.description: The (required) common set of order line Ids for this Override line, not all a required individually, only what can be mapped & derived.

OverrideOrderId.description: The Xfuze Override Order ID, e.g based on a shipmentId, typically a header for a number of overrideLines

OverrideOrderKey.description: The natural key/number of the override order e.g based on a shipmentId

OverrideLineKey.description: The 'natural' Override line key/number, typically either a combination of SalesOrderNumber & a 'sequence number' (derived) OR explicitly supplied unique Id from source - also used to construct the synthetic SOL Xfuze Ids. e.g 123456789_1

OverrideLineSeq.description: The ordinal line sequence number e.g 2

OverrideType.description: The type of the override e.g DeliveryToCustomer, CollectFromStore

OverrideAtts.description: A collection (array) of extended override attributes

ReasonCode.description: The reason code for this Override line

ReasonDesc.description: The reason desc for this Override line

Lineage.description: The event lineage (e.g eventId, asOf) that lead to the observed/derived state of this object/data part
